description:
Elf-vengers are an elite team, ElfHosted's geekiest heroes, who stand ready to aid  current and future users in their ElfHosted adventures!

Want to become an Elf-Venger? Read the "[manifesto](https://elfhosted.com/team/)", and click the :man_in_lotus_position:  reaction below this message to get your "trainee" role, and get access to the #[elf-venger-dojo](https://discord.com/channels/396055506072109067/1198389967328641145), and to the [#elf-venger-hq](https://discord.com/channels/396055506072109067/1198402757321826364)!
